title: Is Doctor Manhattan God? | Watchmen & Philosophy
description:
In this video, we'll explore the groundbreaking #dccomics story "Watchmen" and examine some of the philosophical and theological questions connected to the character known as Doctor Manhattan.

On this channel, we explore the intersection of theology with culture, science, and philosophy. If you'd like to see more video essays like this, please subscribe to the channel, like the video, and leave a comment to encourage the algorithm to help others discover it.


#videoessay #watchmenhbo #doctormanhattan #philosophy #theology 
____

If you find this YouTube channel and the Deep Talks podcast to be helpful and want to see it continue ad-free, would you consider becoming a supporter on Patreon?

You're not only supporting this podcast, but you are also supporting my free Substack page and YouTube channel. We need 200 patrons to ensure that my work can continue in 2023.

https://www.patreon.com/deeptalkstheologypodcast

Watchman was created by writer Alan
Moore and artist Dave Gibbons it was
published by DC Comics and released as a
limited series from 1986 to 1987. the
series garnered critical Acclaim for its
innovative storytelling complex

traditional superhero tropes
Alan Moore known for his
